title: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002 (Beyblade V-Force)
synopsis: The Bladebreakers have to join forces once again because a mysterious group under the lead of Oozuma has defeated them, but the real enemy is not Oozuma. The real threath is formed by a group of people who use cyber-BitBeasts to capture the original ones from the Bladebreakers.
related_anime: ['Bakuten Shoot Beyblade the Movie: Gekitou!! Takao vs. Daichi', 'Bakuten Shoot Beyblade', 'Bakuten Shoot Beyblade G Revolution']
